name: Indian Sandalwood handmade cold process soap
description:
Indian Sandalwood cold process soap

A nice light delicate powder scent with a touch of sandalwood. More powder notes then the traditional woodsy sandalwood

This bar of soap is handmade by using the cold process method. Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We used Shea butter in this wonderful bar. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.


Made with Olive oil, Coconut oil, water, Shea butter, Palm oil, sodium hydroxide, Castor oil, fragrance and oxides for color

name: Apple Cider Scented Wax Pieces wickless scented tart
description:
Apple cider scented wax pieces are perfect for fall! You will receive 3 ounces of wax for your favorite wax melt warmer and are made of a para- soy blend. 


Please follow the manufactures directions on your warmer for use. The length of time time the scent will last will depend on your warmer and hours it is on. Perfect for homes with small children or pets! No flames

I use a few tiny chunks in a small wall plug in melter and a larger melter I will add several pieces. Please be careful not to fill your melter to full, a few pieces is really all that is needed. Wax pieces are breakable to make pieces smaller should you need them smaller. 

Enjoy!

name: Black Currant Tea Handmade Soap
description:
Black Current Tea

This red, gray & white bar of soap is handmade by me using the cold process method. Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We use yummy shea butter in this wonderful bar. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.

Made with Olive, Coconut, Palm, shea butter, Castor oils, fragrance and oxides for color

Scent description
Notes of ripe berries, citron, tart black currant, mandarin & Yuzu, thyme, and Indian & Ceylon tea leaves with a soft dry-down of white musk

You will receive 1 bar weighing between 3- 3.5 ounce bar

* will combine shipping on soap! I can fit 4 bars in a small flat rate box for $5.80 shipping. Anything over $1.00 will be refunded.

*Also be sure to check out our handmade lotion bars & lip balms!

name: Autumn Bonfire Handmade Soap
description:
Autumn Bonfire 

This rustic  bar of soap is handmade by me using the hot process method. Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We use yummy mango butter in this wonderful bar. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.

Scent description
Autumn Bonfire - A fragrance reminiscent of gentle, dusky breezes and bonfires, with notes of dried, wind-blown leaves, heliotrope, charred woods of pine and cedar, amber, smoky sandalwood, and musk with hints of roasted marshmallows, brown sugar, coconut and soft vanilla

Made with Olive, Coconut, palm oil, mango butter, castor oil, sweet almond oil, sodium hydroxide, sodium lactate, coconut milk & fragrance

You will receive 1 bar weighing between 3.5 - 4.5 ounces

* Shipping is $2.40 for 1 bar and $1.00 after that or 
* will combine shipping on soap! I can fit 4 bars in a small flat rate box for $5.80 shipping. Anything over $1.00 will be refunded.
* I will combine shipping and refund anything over $1.00

*Also be sure to check out our handmade lotion bars & lip balms

name: Raspberry Lip Balm
description:
Sweet summer raspberry scented lip balm! Wonderful cocoa butter & Shea butter in this delicious smelling lip balm.

It just glides on your lips, it's so soft! There is no waxy feel. This lip balm is made in small batches and is made with natural ingredients with the acception of the flavor oils. The flavoring is gluten & formaldehyde free. There is also no coloring.

Each tube is safety sealed for your protection

You will receive one .15 oz tube

Ingredients are: Coconut oil, Beeswax, Organic shea butter, Organic cocoa butter & Tocopherol (vitamin e) & flavor oil

As with any handcrafted lip balms, keep in mind that it will melt more easily in heat, cars ect

Please see other listings for different flavors

More flavors coming soon!

name: Crazy Quilt Wax Melt pieces wickless
description:
Crazy Quilt 

Crazy quilt scent or also known as Amish Quilt, is a sugary vanilla, cinnamon, clove and allspice fragrance. Smells like something grandma is baking up in her cozy kitchen. You will receive 3 ounces of wax for your favorite wax melt warmer and are made of a para- soy blend. 


Please follow the manufactures directions on your warmer for use. The length of time time the scent will last will depend on your warmer and hours it is on. Perfect for homes with small children or pets! No flames

I use a few tiny chunks in a small wall plug in melter and a larger melter I will add several pieces. Please be careful not to fill your melter to full, a few pieces is really all that is needed. Wax pieces are breakable to make pieces smaller should you need them smaller. 

Enjoy!

name: Unscented Solid Lotion Bar
description:
Natural solid lotion bars help to keep hands soft and smooth. This bar is unscented, uncolored and the perfect size for keeping in your purse, bag or pocket. This bar comes in a small metal tin. Made from fine ingredients such as cocoa & shea butters, beeswax, coconut oil and arrowroot powder. It is all natural & free of preservatives. You can also use your solid lotion bar on rough elbows or other rough patches. You will receive 1 round bar in a tin.


To use: Simply rub in the palm of your hand so the heat from your hand warms the bar and rub over hands.

* Approx 1 ounce
* Please keep out of water

name: Vanilla Spritz Cookie handmade wax pieces
description:
Warm vanilla cookie scented wax pieces will have you wanting to make cookies. You will receive 3 ounces of wax for your favorite wax melt warmer and are made of a para- soy blend. 


Please follow the manufactures directions for melter use. The length of time time the scent will last will depend on your melter and hours it is on. Perfect for homes with small children or pets! No flames

I use a few tiny chunks in a small wall plug in warmer and a larger warmer I will add several larger pieces. Please be careful not to over fill your warmer. Wax pieces are breakable to make pieces smaller should you need them smaller. 

Enjoy!

name: Coffee House Handmade Soap
description:
Coffee House

Awaken your senses with the aroma of fresh coffee brewing! 
This dark brown bar of soap is handmade by me using the cold process method. Shreds of soap on the top accent this bar making look like a dessert straight from the coffee house!

Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We use yummy Shea butter in this wonderful bar. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.

Made with Olive, Coconut, Palm, Shea butter, Castor oils, fragrance and oxides for color 


Scent description:
You'll find notes of coffee beans and freshly brewed coffee accentuated by hints of rum, brandy, brown sugar, and cocoa beans

You will receive 1 bar weighing between 3- 3.5 ounce bar

* will combine shipping on soap! I can fit 4 bars in a small flat rate box for $5.80 shipping. Anything over $1.00 will be refunded.

*Also be sure to check out our handmade lotion bars & lip balms!

Marshmallow Lip Balm

Wonderful cocoa butter & Shea butter in this delicious smelling lip balm. This tube of marshmallow lip balm smells like yummy sweet, lip-smacking marshmallow confection. Yum! It just glides on your lips, it's so soft! This lip balm is made in small batches and is made with natural ingredients. The flavoring is gluten & formaldehyde free. There is also no coloring.

Each tube is safety sealed for your protection

You will receive one .15 oz tube

Ingredients are: Coconut oil, Beeswax, Organic Shea butter, Organic cocoa butter & Tocopherol (vitamin e) & flavor oil

As with any handcrafted lip balms, keep in mind that it will melt in heat, cars ect

name: Sugar Corn Pudding Wax Melts
description:
A fantastic scent! You won't want to stop smelling this one. Sugar Corn Pudding ~ with notes of fresh corn, butter, creamy milk and sugar. This scent will be great warming on a cool Autumn night. 

Mud Creek Alchemy's melts are made in small batches, never mass produced. This fabulous melt is made with a para-soy blend wax. Perfect for people who do not want an open flame as they are wickless. For use in your favorite melter/warmer. Please follow your manufactures directions on you warmer.

To use: simply break off 1 chunk for small wall warmer or several chunk for larger warmers
You will receive 1 wax bar that will break into 6 chunks. Weight is 2 oz total

name: Kettle Corn Handmade Hot Process Soap
description:
Kettle Corn Handmade Soap

Simple & delicious!

This rustic uncolored bar of soap is handmade by me using the hot process method. Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We only used 4 oils in this wonderful bar. No colorants used, the color is from the fragrance oil itself. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.

Scent description
Aromatic treat of freshly-popped popcorn drizzled with brown sugar & syrupy molasses then hit with a dash of salt. A unique, delicious treat for all ages!


Made with Olive, Coconut, palm oil, sweet almond oil, sodium hydroxide, sodium lactate, coconut milk & fragrance


You will receive 1 bar weighing between 3-3.5 ounces

* will combine shipping on soap! I can fit 4 bars in a small flat rate box for $5.80 shipping. Anything over $1.00 will be refunded.

*Also be sure to check out our handmade lotion bars & lip balms!

name: Chocolate Mint Lip Balm
description:
This tube of lip balm is a nice combination of chocolate and just the right amount of peppermint! Smells like a peppermint patty. It just glides on your lips, it's so soft! Wonderful cocoa butter & shea butter in this delicious smelling lip balm. This balm is made in small batches and is made with natural ingredients. The flavoring is gluten & formaldehyde free. No strange chemicals here! There is also no coloring.

Each tube is safety sealed for your protection

name: Brown Sugar & Fig Handmade Soap
description:
Brown sugar & Fig

This bar of soap is handmade by me using the cold process method. Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We used  Shea butter in this wonderful bar. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.

Compare to a famous bath store scent!
Scent description- A magical, complex fragrance composed of top notes of Fresh figs, peaches, and passion fruit; followed by middle notes of coconut milk, vanilla orchid, jasmine, muguet, and freesia; well-balanced with base notes of vanilla beans, caramel, maple sugar, fig leaves, and musk.

Made with Olive oil, Coconut oil, water, Shea butter, Palm oil, sodium hydroxide, Castor oil, fragrance and oxides for color

name: Black Raspberry Vanilla Handmade Soap
description:
Black Raspberry Vanilla

 This white, purple & maroon bar of soap is handmade by me using the cold process method. I have used activated charcoal for the pencil line to create a stunning effect. Made in small batches and hand cut making each bar unique. We used yummy coconut milk and lots of Shea butter in this wonderful bar. Handmade soap makes a great gift or a splendid treat for yourself.

Made with Olive oil, Coconut oil, water, Shea butter, Palm oil, sodium hydroxide, Castor oil, coconut milk, fragrance and oxides for color and activated charcoal (pencil line)

Scent description
Ripe black raspberries are mixed with dark plum and warm vanilla

You will receive 1 bar weighing 4 ounces

This fabulous melt is made with a para-soy blend wax. Perfect for people who do not want an open flame. For use in your favorite melter/warmer. Please follow your manufactures directions on you warmer.

You will receive 1 wax bar that will break into 6 chunks. Weight is 2 oz

name: Discounted! Assorted Lip Balms
description:
Discounted to make room for new labels!

Assorted lip balms in many different flavors. I'm clearing out my lip balm stash to make way for the newly designed labels. Grabs these at a discounted price! I will be adding more soon.

Discontinued flavors are:
Horchata - sweet, vanilla & cinnamon Mexican drink

Monkey Farts - fruity bubblegum scent

Green Apple - yummy green apple scent

Margarita -  Lime, just like the drink

Black cherry - Bursting cherry scent

Blue Raspberry Slushie - Just like a favorite slush from the fair

*Please make sure to choose your flavor

Each lip balm is made in small batches and contains Shea butter & coco butter. Each tube is safety sealed for your protection

You will receive one .15 oz tube

**I can fit 4-5 lip balms in a mailer for the price of $1.70 shipping**
